# completionBlock()

**Type Method**

Returns the completion block object.

## Declaration

```swift
class func completionBlock() -> (() -> Void)?
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransaction/setCompletionBlock(_:)] for a description of the role of the completion block object.

## Getting and Setting Completion Block Objects

- **setCompletionBlock(_:)**: Sets the completion block object.
